column4: hi everyone...does anyone know of a quick and easy way to create a wireless access point under ubuntu with a wlan usb key? i have the wlan and wmaster interfaces in iwconfig and ifconfig but im not sure how to get it visible to my laptop and psp
Did you try creating a new wireless network in network-manager?
i did, and all it does is disconnect my wired network connection such that i dont have internet anymore
and my psp doesnt find the wlan connection then anyway
